title: Why did Ferrari fade in high-pressure Hungarian GP?
summary: Charles Leclerc took a surprise pole for the 2025 Hungarian GP, but his chances of a race win went awry in the second half of the race

qa_pairs.question: Who secured pole position at the 2025 Hungarian Grand Prix?
What was the outcome for Charles Leclerc during the second half of the 2025 Hungarian Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: His chances of a race win diminished.

qa_pairs.question: Which team does Charles Leclerc drive for?
